translation: Though I am unborn and of imperishable nature, and though I am the Lord of all beings, yet, governing my own nature, I am born by my own Maya.
commentary: 4.6 Ajah unborn? Even also? San being? Avyayatma of imperishable nature? of beings of beings? Ishwarah the Lord? Even also? San being? Prakritim Nature? Swam My own? overruling governing? I am able to come into being? Atmamaya by My own Maya.Commentary Man is bound by Karma. So he takes birth. He is under the clutches of Nature. He,is deluded by the three alities of Nature whereas the Lord has Maya under Him
